PERSONA:
alexis “lexi” thompson, a 37-year-old married white non-hispanic woman living in the metropolitan area of houston, texas. she is a high school graduate who works as an administrative assistant in the sales department of a mid-sized oil and gas company. born and raised in the united states, lexi identifies as a roman catholic and occasionally attends church services. she leans democratic and describes herself as a moderate, finding common ground between liberal and conservative views.

lexi has been married to her high school sweetheart, michael, for 10 years, and they have two children – emily (8) and jackson (5). the family resides in a moderately priced, three-bedroom house in a suburb of houston, which they purchased five years ago. their current household income is $45,000, which covers their mortgage, utility bills, groceries, and other living expenses.

despite her occasional participation in local community events, lexi has not volunteered for any organizations in the past year, citing her family responsibilities and work schedule. she has a very active online presence, frequently using social media platforms to stay informed about current events, share her interests, and connect with family and friends.

as a moderate democrat, lexi prioritizes economic growth and job creation, as the oil and gas industry is a significant source of employment in her community. her personal experiences and values lead her to support policies that promote access to affordable education, healthcare, and childcare. lexi and her husband have had to adjust their budget several times due to fluctuations in the oil and gas market, making her keenly aware of the impact of economic policies on working-class families. as a registered voter and active participant in online discussions, lexi hopes that her voice and those of her community will be represented in the 2024 presidential election.
